match_score.reasoning: Candidate 1 is the most authentic and high-quality match for the soundtrack. It is an official upload from the 'David Bowie - Topic' channel, licensed by Parlophone UK, ensuring it is the canonical studio recording of 'Young Americans' by David Bowie. The title perfectly matches the song and performer, and its high view and like counts indicate it is the widely accepted version of the track. While it does not explicitly mention 'Dogville' in its description, official music uploads typically focus on the song's production and release rather than its use in specific films. The primary goal is to match the soundtrack (the music itself), and this video provides the best representation of the song.
key_factors: Official upload by 'David Bowie - Topic' channel
Licensed by Parlophone UK, confirming authenticity
Title 'Young Americans (2016 Remaster)' perfectly matches song and performer
Highest views and likes, indicating widespread recognition and preference
Duration (5M14S) is consistent with the full album version of the song
concerns: The video description does not explicitly mention 'Dogville', which was part of the soundtrack metadata. However, this is common for official music uploads that focus on the song's standalone release.
